about.title: About Goldie XO
about.headline: NYC EDM & Latin House — From the Streets to the Stage
about.text: Born and raised in the heart of New York City, Goldie XO brings an electrifying fusion of EDM and Latin House to stages worldwide. With a signature sound that blends pulsating beats with Latin rhythms, Goldie has become a force in the underground club scene and beyond.
about.teaser: Born and raised in the heart of New York City, Goldie XO brings an electrifying fusion of EDM and Latin House to stages worldwide. With a signature sound that blends pulsating beats with Latin rhythms, Goldie has become a force in the underground club scene and beyond.

bio.paragraph1: Goldie XO's story is one of resilience and rhythm. Born prematurely and defying the odds from day one, Goldie grew up with New York City in their veins — its streets, its sounds, and its unstoppable energy. A serious car accident in early adulthood could have ended the journey, but instead it became a turning point: music became the anchor and the escape, and the decks became home.
bio.paragraph2: Rooted in NYC, Goldie carved a path through the city's underground scene, blending EDM with Latin House and creating a sound that's both intimate and explosive. From basement parties to main stages, the journey has been fueled by a belief that music can heal, connect, and transform.
bio.quote: The beat doesn't care where you came from. It just wants you to move.
bio.paragraph3: Today Goldie XO brings that same passion to every set — whether in a packed club, a festival, or behind the mic on the podcast. The beat goes on, and so does the story.

book.title: The Beat Goes On
book.subtitle: A Memoir by DJ Goldie XO
book.text: From the streets of NYC to the world's biggest stages, discover the journey of DJ Goldie XO. A story of passion, rhythm, and breaking boundaries.
